Message:
That day, I could do nothing
as my mother was tossed
into the raging fire.
Nothing...

Even as she called out
my name again and again...

My past still has me
in its chains.

Everything I witnessed
that day flashed into my mind,
paralyzing my body.

I can’t run to my mother,
let alone reach out
towards her...

I still am, and always will be,
that powerless little girl...
“Sabrina!”

Suddenly,
Moddey called out my name.
I look and see her in the lake,
despite her hating it so much...

“Your mother’s
resting peacefully.

If the same thing
happened to you,
you’ll make her so worried
she’ll jump straight out of
her grave.”

“Go on, show her.
Show her who you are now...!”

Moddey’s right.
I’m no longer that
powerless little girl.

I am Sabrina.
Comrade to the Duke—
to everyone!

Reach out.
Step forward!

Your comrades are
counting on you...
Move!

In that moment,
I found a strange light
shining in my hand.
Is this...a new power?
